dt-option.name: searchBuilder.logic

type.description: The value for the default logic operator for groups, either `AND` or `OR`.

dt-option.default: The default value for the `-init searchBuilder.logic` option is `AND` meaning that as standard the initial logic applied to groups will be `AND` logic.
dt-option.description: This is useful as it allows the default logic to be defined on a groups initialisation.
